meta.job_title: BD Subject Matter Expert I/Proposal Writer

duties_responsibilities.duty: Research, develop, and write content for technical, management, past performance, corporate experience, and/or small business participation sections during the proposal development phase.
Conceptualize, research, gather data, and draft proposal sections incorporating the company's best practices and approaches.
Participate in the development of management and staffing approaches.
Work directly with proposal and capture managers to develop winning strategies, themes, and discriminators and incorporate these into proposal sections.
Participate in Black Hat and Blue Team Strategy sessions, Pink, Red, and Gold reviews.
Prepare written text and incorporate narrative and graphics into business proposals and other documents according to prepared outlines and specifications.
Collaborate with graphic artists to develop illustrations, charts, matrices, flow diagrams, and process flow charts for proposals.
Maintain and update a content repository for materials used and reused during the proposal development process.
Participate in reviews to verify the accuracy and consistency of proposal narratives and company data points.
Coordinate with subcontractors to ensure information meets company standards and RFP requirements.
Perform other position-related duties as assigned or requested.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in an associated discipline. Two (2) years’ experience in business development or related discipline can be substituted for each year of the four (4) years of college.

Eight (8) years’ experience providing technical advisor and/or writing expertise for medium to large-sized proposals or projects in management and/technical areas or ten (10) years progressive proposal development experience with at least five years of writing experience.
May require ability to obtain and maintain a US security clearance. Additional clearances may also be required from the DoD, DoE and other agencies of the federal government.
